crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'user' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'username': doc.username, 'email': doc.email ,'first_name': doc.first_name, 'last_name': doc.last_name}); }

group_by_username.map: function(doc) { if(doc.pvt_type != 'user' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit( doc.username, doc._id ); }
group_by_username.reduce: function(key, values, rereduce) { if (rereduce) return values; else return values[0]; }

creds_by_md5.map: function(doc) { if(!doc.pvt_md5_auth || (doc.pvt_type != 'user' || doc.pvt_deleted)) return; emit( doc.pvt_md5_auth, {'owner_id': doc._id, 'account_id': doc.pvt_account_id} ); }

creds_by_sha.map: function(doc) { if(!doc.pvt_sha1_auth || (doc.pvt_type != 'user' || doc.pvt_deleted)) return; emit( doc.pvt_sha1_auth, {'owner_id': doc._id, 'account_id': doc.pvt_account_id} ); }
